featured.text: Research also suggests that firstborn children generally become more conservative than other children because they receive most of the parental discipline.

definition.zh_def: 第一個出生的孩子，通常指家庭中的長子或長女。
definition.en_def: The first child born to a set of parents.
definition.example: As the firstborn, she felt a sense of responsibility to set a good example for her younger siblings.
